content: {"version":1,"machineId":"b9970bdb-fcf0-45a9-a33f-5c669a362022","content":"{\"gui.code-snippets\":\"{\\n\\t\\\"GTK 3 GUI\\\": {\\n\\t\\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"gui\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"import gi\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"gi.require_version(\\\\\\\"Gtk\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"3.0\\\\\\\")\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"from gi.repository import Gtk\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"class MyWindow(Gtk.Window):\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"    def __init__(self):\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        # Gtk.Window.__init__(self, params)\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        pass\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"win = MyWindow()\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"win.connect(\\\\\\\"destroy\\\\\\\", Gtk.main_quit)\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"win.show_all()\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"Gtk.main()\\\"\\n\\t\\t],\\n\\t\\t\\\"description\\\": \\\"GTK 3 GUI\\\"\\n\\t}\\n}\",\"python.json\":\"{\\n\\t// Place your snippets for python here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and \\n\\t// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:\\n\\t// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the \\n\\t// same ids are connected.\\n\\t// Example:\\n\\t// \\\"Print to console\\\": {\\n\\t// \\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"log\\\",\\n\\t// \\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t// \\t\\t\\\"console.log('$1');\\\",\\n\\t// \\t\\t\\\"$2\\\"\\n\\t// \\t],\\n\\t// \\t\\\"description\\\": \\\"Log output to console\\\"\\n\\t// }\\n}\",\"glade.code-snippets\":\"{\\n\\t\\\"GTK from glade\\\": {\\n\\t\\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"glade\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"import gi\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"gi.require_version(\\\\\\\"Gtk\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"3.0\\\\\\\")\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"from gi.repository import Gtk\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"class Main:\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"    def __init__(self):\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        glade_file = \\\\\\\"show_datarame.glade\\\\\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        self.builder = gtk.Builder()\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        self.builder.add_from_file(glade_file)\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        window = self.builder.get_object(\\\\\\\"MainWindow\\\\\\\")\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        window.connect(\\\\\\\"delete-event\\\\\\\", gtk.main_quit)\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"        window.show()\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"if __name__ == \\\\\\\"__main__\\\\\\\":\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"    main = Main()\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"    gtk.main()\\\"\\n\\t\\t],\\n\\t\\t\\\"description\\\": \\\"Boiler plate code for glade GUI\\\"\\n\\t}\\n}\"}"}
